messages.message: If container port as well as pod label is same then we don't need to add them.
@Pranjal Rai is pod label is also same?
Yes, it's same for both offline and online

@abhitaker can we add a network-policies dir inside your internal directory: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/tree/master/deployment-configs/internal? And then add that to the python script to add files from here, similar to what Shubham added here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/deployment-configs/gen_base_configs.py#L183-L186?
That’s what I’ve tried to do here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/26003
awesome — let me take a look
